remarks: Version of ~ axc11 with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  Remark: the following theorems ( ~ hbae , ~ nfae , ~ hbnae , ~ nfnae , ~ hbnaes ) would need to be totally unbundled to be proved without ~ ax-13 , hence would be simple consequences of ~ ax-5 or ~ nfv .  (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
